Pre-Game Insights: The starting lineups for the Cleveland Guardians and Tampa Bay Rays for the game on September 14, 2024, were announced.
The game is scheduled to take place at Progressive Field at 6:10 p.m.
The game will be broadcast on Bally Sports Great Lakes, WTAM 1100 AM, WMMS 100.7 FM, WARF 1350 AM (Spanish), and the Guardians Radio Network.
The starting pitchers for the game are LHP Joey Cantillo for the Guardians and RHP Drew Rasmussen for the Rays.
